mapper.update: update calendar set type=#{type}, content=#{content}, startDate=to_date(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'), endDate=to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select no,type,content,to_char(startDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') startDate,to_char(endDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') endDate from calendar where email=#{email}
